## `ExcludeProperNouns`

Specifies whether to exclude proper nouns from the document analysis.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
ExcludeProperNouns(boolean exclude)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
`boolean` exclude | `true` to exclude proper nouns, `false` to include them.
